theWeaponMaster:FenrirLacerate.NAME: [#b7410e]Lacerate
theWeaponMaster:FenrirLacerate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Lacerate. NL Evolve: Attack an enemy with 3+ Lacerate.
theWeaponMaster:FenrirLacerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage and deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Lacerate. Deal 10% bonus damage per Lacerate stack. NL Evolve: Attack an enemy with 3+ Lacerate.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirShieldEater.NAME: [#b7410e]Shield [#b7410e]Eater
theWeaponMaster:FenrirShieldEater.DESCRIPTION: Absorb up to !M! Block from target enemy. NL Evolve: Destroy all enemy Block.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirDefensiveStance.NAME: [#b7410e]Defensive [#b7410e]Stance
theWeaponMaster:FenrirDefensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and Defensive Stance. Lose 20% of this Block whenever you play a Fenrir card. NL Evolve: All enemies intend to attack you.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirHeavySwing.NAME: [#b7410e]Heavy [#b7410e]Swing
theWeaponMaster:FenrirHeavySwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every card in your hand, apply Lacerate equal to half the cards in your hand.NL Evolve: Play while holding more than 3 cards. Gains half the Evolution bonuses.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirUnleashed.NAME: [#b7410e]Fenrir [#b7410e]Unleashed
theWeaponMaster:FenrirUnleashed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the weakest enemy. Overkill damage is added to the next attack. NL Unstoppable, Evolve: Kill an enemy.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusSlash.NAME: [#3a7ebf]Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Flash !M!: Draw a card.
theWeaponMaster:CerberusSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Power_Flash !M!: Draw a card.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusEssenceSlash.NAME: [#3a7ebf]Essence [#3a7ebf]Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusEssenceSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Flash !M!: Enemies take !SV! damage for every unique buff and debuff they have.
theWeaponMaster:CerberusEssenceSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Power_Flash !M!: Enemies take !SV! damage for every unique buff and debuff they have.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusModularSlash.NAME: [#3a7ebf]Modular [#3a7ebf]Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusModularSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Utility_Flash 4: Gain special effects for each card you discard.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusIaiSlash.NAME: [#3a7ebf]Iai [#3a7ebf]Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusIaiSlash.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Deal !D! damage. NL Flash !M!: Increase Flash damage by 25% for every turn retained. Resets when discarded or used. NL Turns retained: !SV!.
theWeaponMaster:CerberusIaiSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Deal !D! damage. NL Power_Flash !M!: Increase discard damage by 33% for every turn retained. Resets when discarded or used. NL Turns retained: !SV!.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusDrainSlash.NAME: [#3a7ebf]Drain [#3a7ebf]Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusDrainSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Flash !M!: Steal up to !SV! units of a random enemy buff.
theWeaponMaster:CerberusDrainSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Power_Flash !M!: Steal up to !SV! units of a random enemy buff.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanCrush.NAME: [#746550]Crush
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanCrush.DESCRIPTION: Charges: !SV! NL Deal !D! damage, apply Stagger based on enemy Block. NL Armor_Piercing: !M!. NL Charged 1: Increase Armor_Piercing and Stagger by 50%.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGauntletCharger.NAME: [#746550]Gauntlet [#746550]Charger
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGauntletCharger.DESCRIPTION: Charges: !SV! NL Discharge the Leviathan to deal !D! damage randomly or recharge it to gain !B! Block per charge.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGroundSplitter.NAME: [#746550]Ground [#746550]Splitter
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGroundSplitter.DESCRIPTION: Charges: !SV!. NL Stagger all enemies depending on their total Block. Charged 1: Apply !M! Vulnerable.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanDeepImpact.NAME: [#746550]Deep [#746550]Impact
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanDeepImpact.DESCRIPTION: Charges: !SV! NL Deal !D! damage to the first enemy. NL Unstoppable: Enemy Block. Gain Armor_Piercing: !M! NL Charged: 2. Always activate Unstoppable.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanEarthquake.NAME: [#746550]Earthquake
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanEarthquake.DESCRIPTION: Charges: !SV!. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies, ignores thorns. NL Charged 3: Attack a second time at half damage.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantRavenous.NAME: [#80ca2d]Ravenous
theWeaponMaster:RevenantRavenous.DESCRIPTION: Hungry 4: Gain 3 Vicious. NL Deal !D! damage, Gain !M! Vicious. NL Retain: Increase Vicious gain by 2 until Weapon_Swap or combat ends.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Hungry 4: Gain 3 Vicious. NL Deal !M! damage, gain !D! Vicious. NL Retain: Increase Vicious gain by 2 until Weapon_Swap or combat ends.
Hungry 4: Sated. NL Deal !M! damage, gain !D! Vicious. NL Retain: Increase Vicious gain by 2 until Weapon_Swap or combat ends.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantChopChopCHOP.NAME: [#80ca2d]Chop [#80ca2d]Chop [#80ca2d]CHOP
theWeaponMaster:RevenantChopChopCHOP.DESCRIPTION: Hungry 5: Gain another Attack. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Hungry 5: Gain another Attack. NL Deal !D! damage.
Hungry 5: Sated. NL Deal !D! damage.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantNoseToTail.NAME: [#80ca2d]Nose [#80ca2d]To [#80ca2d]Tail
theWeaponMaster:RevenantNoseToTail.DESCRIPTION: Hungry 6: Reduce Nose_to_Tail threshold by 1. NL Deal !D! damage. Apply Nose_to_Tail. NL Gain !M! Vicious.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Hungry 6: Reduce Nose_to_Tail threshold by 1. NL Deal !D! damage. Apply Nose_to_Tail
Hungry 6: Sated. NL Deal !D! damage. Apply Nose_to_Tail.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantHungrySteel.NAME: [#80ca2d]Hungry [#80ca2d]Steel
theWeaponMaster:RevenantHungrySteel.DESCRIPTION: Hungry 8: Apply and increase base Chopping_Block by 1, deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Vicious.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Hungry 8: Apply and increase base Chopping_Block by 1, deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Vicious.
Hungry 8: Sated. NL Apply Chopping_Block, deal !D! damage.  NL Gain !M! Vicious.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantBloodbath.NAME: [#80ca2d]Bloodbath
theWeaponMaster:RevenantBloodbath.DESCRIPTION: Hungry X: Gain Vicious equal to Hunger. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy and lose 5 Vicious. NL Unstoppable: 5+ Vicious.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Hungry X: Gain Vicious equal to Hunger. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy and lose 5 Vicious. NL Unstoppable: 5+ Vicious.
Hungry X: Gain Vicious equal to 150% of Hunger. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy and lose 5 Vicious. NL Unstoppable: 5+ Vicious.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSource.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Source
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSource.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to your target and apply Mana_Burn. NL Ignite !M!

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredScissors.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Scissors
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredScissors.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Mana_Burn. NL Deal !D! damage and Ignite !M!.
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredScissors.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Mana_Burn, then Deal !D! damage and Ignite !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [#3abfbe]Right [#3abfbe]Half
Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Mana_Burn. NL Deal !D! damage and Ignite !M!.
Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Mana_Burn. !M!. NL Split_Scissors !B!, Exhaust.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposScissorHalf.NAME: [#3abfbe]Left [#3abfbe]Half
theWeaponMaster:AtroposScissorHalf.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, Ignite !M!. NL Split_Scissors !B!, Exhaust.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPath.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Path
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPath.DESCRIPTION: Target Enemy attacks a random enemy this turn. NL Apply !M! Mana_Burn. NL Exhaust.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPain.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Pain
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPain.DESCRIPTION: Delay half of the damage you take to next turn.
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Delay one third of the damage you take to next turn. The remaining third is dealt to all enemies instead.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSoul.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Soul
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSoul.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Ignite All. NL Consume all Mana_Burn stacks.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverBuckshot.NAME: Buckshot
theWeaponMaster:RevolverBuckshot.DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.
theWeaponMaster:RevolverBuckshot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverCustomCartridge.NAME: Custom Cartridge
theWeaponMaster:RevolverCustomCartridge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust one single target Attack Ammo. NL Deal !M! % damage to the target and !SV! % damage to the creature behind it.
theWeaponMaster:RevolverCustomCartridge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust one single target Attack Ammo. NL Deal !M! % damage to the target and !SV! % damage to the creature behind it. NL Unstoppable: Enemy Minions ( !SV! % damage).

theWeaponMaster:RevolverDoubleTap.NAME: Double Tap
theWeaponMaster:RevolverDoubleTap.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Ammunition card is played a second time for !M! % damage.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverFullMetal.NAME: Full Metal Jacket
theWeaponMaster:RevolverFullMetal.DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Armor_Piercing: !M!.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverHollowPoint.NAME: Hollow-Point Ammo
theWeaponMaster:RevolverHollowPoint.DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Enemies without Block take !M! % more damage.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverLowRecoil.NAME: Low Recoil Ammo
theWeaponMaster:RevolverLowRecoil.DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Play the top card of your draw pile if it's an Ammunition card. Otherwise draw a card.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverMarksmanship.NAME: Marksmanship
theWeaponMaster:RevolverMarksmanship.DESCRIPTION: Revolver cards now also scale with Dexterity. NL Gain !M! Dexterity.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverKneecap.NAME: Kneecap
theWeaponMaster:RevolverKneecap.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Kneecap target enemy for three turns and reduce their Strength by !M!.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverQuickload.NAME: Quickload
theWeaponMaster:RevolverQuickload.DESCRIPTION: Immediately Reload your revolver and add the first Ammunition card from your draw pile to your hand.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverSpecialGradeAmmo.NAME: Special Grade Ammo
theWeaponMaster:RevolverSpecialGradeAmmo.DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Deal !D! damage. Splintering Ammo: Apply !M! Lacerate. NL Ethereal Ammo: Apply !M! Mana_Burn.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverTwinned.NAME: Twinned Shot
theWeaponMaster:RevolverTwinned.DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Deal !D! damage twice.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverUnload.NAME: Unload
theWeaponMaster:RevolverUnload.DESCRIPTION: Discard Ammunition cards from your hand and deal !D! damage for each. NL As long as you have Shots left, discard from the top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust

theWeaponMaster:RevolverWarningShot.NAME: Warning Shot
theWeaponMaster:RevolverWarningShot.DESCRIPTION: Ammunition, Reload. NL Stagger all enemies.

theWeaponMaster:BullyBullysAudacity.NAME: The Bully's Audacity
theWeaponMaster:BullyBullysAudacity.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Gain !M! Block for every Bully card played this fight. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!

theWeaponMaster:BullyClothesline.NAME: Clothesline
theWeaponMaster:BullyClothesline.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Weak.

theWeaponMaster:BullyConfidence.NAME: Confidence
theWeaponMaster:BullyConfidence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Gain !M! Artifact, gain !B! Block.

theWeaponMaster:BullyDinerArgument.NAME: Diner Argument
theWeaponMaster:BullyDinerArgument.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Exhaust. Can only be played as the first card of a turn. NL Force every enemy to take a random action.

theWeaponMaster:BullyIntimidatingPresenc.NAME: Intimidating Presence
theWeaponMaster:BullyIntimidatingPresenc.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL All enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

theWeaponMaster:BullyMeanToEveryone.NAME: Mean to everyone!
theWeaponMaster:BullyMeanToEveryone.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Taunt all enemies. NL They gain !M! Strength until the end of the turn. NL Gain !M! Strength for every applied Taunt, lose half of the gained Strength at the end of the turn. NL Exhaust.

theWeaponMaster:BullyMock.NAME: Mock
theWeaponMaster:BullyMock.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL If target enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak. Otherwise apply !M! Vulnerable.
theWeaponMaster:BullyMock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL All enemies gain !M! Weak if they're attacking. Otherwise apply !M! Vulnerable.

theWeaponMaster:BullyShakedown.NAME: Shakedown
theWeaponMaster:BullyShakedown.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 3-6 Gold.
theWeaponMaster:BullyShakedown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 6-9 Gold.

theWeaponMaster:BullySlap.NAME: Slap
theWeaponMaster:BullySlap.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak.
theWeaponMaster:BullySlap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Deal !D! damage damage twice each and apply !M! Weak.

theWeaponMaster:BullySuckerPunch.NAME: Sucker Punch
theWeaponMaster:BullySuckerPunch.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this is the first card played this combat, deal !M! damage and Intimidate.
theWeaponMaster:BullySuckerPunch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Innate NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this is the first card played this combat, deal !M! damage and Intimidate.

theWeaponMaster:BullyTerrifyingHowl.NAME: Terrifying Howl
theWeaponMaster:BullyTerrifyingHowl.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Intimidate all enemies. NL Gain !BULLY! additional Vicious per Intimidated enemy. NL Exhaust
theWeaponMaster:BullyTerrifyingHowl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! Apply !M! Vulnerable and Intimidate all enemies. Gain !BULLY! additional Vicious per Intimidated enemy. NL Exhaust.

theWeaponMaster:BullyPushover.NAME: Pushover
theWeaponMaster:BullyPushover.DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Deal !M! Damage for every debuff.

theWeaponMaster:BullyWimp.NAME: Wimp
theWeaponMaster:BullyWimp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully !BULLY! NL Apply !M! Weak to all enemies.

theWeaponMaster:GenericBerserkerStance.NAME: Berserker Stance
theWeaponMaster:GenericBerserkerStance.DESCRIPTION: Vicious decays slower. Gain 1 extra Vicious every time you attack.
theWeaponMaster:GenericBerserkerStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Vicious decays slower. Gain 1 extra Vicious every time you attack.

theWeaponMaster:GenericBobAndWeave.NAME: Bob and Weave
theWeaponMaster:GenericBobAndWeave.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Bob: Gain additional !M! Block for every enemy that intends to attack. NL Weave: 1 energy if all enemies are attacking.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Bob
Gain !B! Block. NL Gain additional !M! Block for every enemy that intends to attack.
Weave
Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 Energy if all enemies intend to attack.

theWeaponMaster:GenericCounterBlow.NAME: Counter Blow
theWeaponMaster:GenericCounterBlow.DESCRIPTION: Discard the top card of your draw pile to immediately counter an enemy's attack for !M! plus the cards cost, or up to !D! damage if you discarded an Attack (and it's higher.).

theWeaponMaster:GenericDodge.NAME: Dodge
theWeaponMaster:GenericDodge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a random Attack card from your discard pile to your hand.
theWeaponMaster:GenericDodge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a random Attack and Skill card from your discard pile to your hand.

theWeaponMaster:GenericFlashbang.NAME: Flashbang
theWeaponMaster:GenericFlashbang.DESCRIPTION: Stun. NL Stagger adjacent enemies. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!
theWeaponMaster:GenericFlashbang.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Stun. NL Stagger adjacent enemies. Draw a card. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!

theWeaponMaster:GenericInvestigate.NAME: Investigate
theWeaponMaster:GenericInvestigate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this card played twice, choose 1 of 3 random Attack cards and Skill cards, then add them to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!

theWeaponMaster:GenericOpportunism.NAME: Opportunism
theWeaponMaster:GenericOpportunism.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block, otherwise deal !D! damage.

theWeaponMaster:GenericPreparation.NAME: Preparation
theWeaponMaster:GenericPreparation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL If your Block isn't broken until your next turn, the first Attack you play costs 1 less Energy.

theWeaponMaster:GenericRecklessness.NAME: Recklessness
theWeaponMaster:GenericRecklessness.DESCRIPTION: Draw an extra card for the next !M! turns. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable.

theWeaponMaster:GenericRelaxAndRecollect.NAME: Relax and Recollect
theWeaponMaster:GenericRelaxAndRecollect.DESCRIPTION: Relax: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose half your Vicious. Gain that much Block. NL Recollect: Exhaust !M! cards from your discard pile, gain !SV! Energy.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Relax
Gain !B! Block and draw a card. NL Lose half your Vicious. Gain that much Block.
Recollect
Draw a card. NL Exhaust !M! cards from your discard pile, then gain !SV! Energy.

theWeaponMaster:GenericRedirectBlows.NAME: Redirect Blows
theWeaponMaster:GenericRedirectBlows.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Take !SV! % less damage until your next turn. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage taken. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!

theWeaponMaster:GenericSleightOfHand.NAME: Sleight of Hand
theWeaponMaster:GenericSleightOfHand.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard a card. NL Select one card from your discard pile and add it to your hand.

theWeaponMaster:GenericThrowingKnives.NAME: Throwing Knives
theWeaponMaster:GenericThrowingKnives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!
